text: (lively music)

- mdf commerce is a
holding of about 18 brands.

We're multidisciplinary
in multiple domains,

both supply chain in the
e-procurement divisions,
e-commerce divisions and e-marketplaces.

So we have a very wide breadth
of diversification under us,

but all coming together to
offer one common service.

So we have 850 employees that
are spread across the globe.
Part of the organization's strategy

is to grow and accelerate into
a much, much larger company.
So we needed to be able

to be able to prepare and
respond for that need.

The AWS Cloud enables us
to get to the next level.
The next level of elasticity,
responsiveness, disaster recovery,

the ability to provision
quickly and scale quickly
across the globe.
By leveraging AWS's partner framework,
we're able to gain insights and accelerate

some of those innovations
that would otherwise

be potentially out of reach
for us or longer to achieve
if we didn't have that relationship.
At the end of the day,

our customers benefit
from a better product,
a faster service and better innovation,
which means new services faster.
AWS and their services really helped us

to kind of get ourselves
to the next leg up
and they continued to do so even today.
(bright music)
